entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:16 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 7:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -39.7°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
